::Shadow Wing/Spears::

Shadow Wing::
She finished welding a few more scrap sheets to the hull and put the 
torch down.  She looked at the ship.  It was beginning to look more 
like a ship and less like swiss cheese.  She looked over at Spears, 
who was assisting her weld the hull.  "If you want to stay here and 
work out here, I can start on the inside and work on Teletran if you 
want?" 

Spears::
"Yeah, go ahead and get started on the computer.  I don't know that 
much about computers. Good luck, that computer was blown to bits."

Shadow Wing::
"Yes I know. ONly the Matrix can help me with that one."
She walked over and went up the ramp into the ship. With a little 
luck, she would be able to do something for Teletran.

Spears::
She continued to work on the outside of the ship.
